name: Biology
description: Study living organisms, cells, genetics, and ecosystems.

concepts.title: Cell Structure
concepts.content: Learn the parts of cells and their functions.

concepts.title: Genetics
concepts.content: Understand DNA, inheritance, and genetic variation.

concepts.title: Evolution
concepts.content: Explore natural selection and the history of life on Earth.

concepts.title: Ecosystems
concepts.content: Investigate how organisms interact with each other and their environment.
